rules_text:
[i](As this enters, insert it into one of your three programs. At your first main phase each turn, the next program runs all its Subroutines.)[/i]
Whenever this Subroutine runs, you may pay {X} and sacrifice it. If you do, draw a card, then add X mana in any combination of colors.
notes:
!tokens Program A ERR;Program B ERR;Program C ERR
!

art5
